Typography

Baseline styles and usage examples for for common typographical elements.

Headings

Headings <h1> through <h6>, including usage examples for headings with subtext.

Standard Headlines

Heading One

Heading Two

Heading Three

Heading Four

Heading Five
Heading Six
<h1>Heading One</h1>
<h2>Heading Two</h2>
<h3>Heading Three</h3>
<h4>Heading Four</h4>
<h5>Heading Five</h5>
<h6>Heading Six</h6>

Headings with Subtext

Add subtext to a heading by including a <span> inside <h1>, <h2>, or <h3>. Contents of the <span> will be treated as subtext.

Heading One Subtext

Heading Two Subtext

Heading Three Subtext 

<h1>
    Heading One
    <span>Subtext</span>
</h1>

<h2>
    Heading Two
    <span>Subtext</span>
</h2>

<h3>
    Heading Three
    <span>Subtext</span>
</h3>

Paragraph Styles

Unclassified, primary, secondary, and tertiary paragraphs.

Primary Text

Add a significant amount of emphasis to a paragraph.

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, ipsum commodo eros lacus. Adipiscing lectus quis eu vel mauris duis, ac tellus mauris cursus et. Sed deserunt augue orci, pede ac.

<p class="primary">Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, ipsum commodo eros lacus. Adipiscing lectus quis eu vel mauris duis, ac tellus mauris cursus et. Sed deserunt augue orci, pede ac.</p>

Secondary Text

Add a moderate amount of emphasis to a paragraph.

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, ipsum commodo eros lacus. Adipiscing lectus quis eu vel mauris duis, ac tellus mauris cursus et. Sed deserunt augue orci, pede ac.

<p class="secondary">Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, ipsum commodo eros lacus. Adipiscing lectus quis eu vel mauris duis, ac tellus mauris cursus et. Sed deserunt augue orci, pede ac.</p>

Tertiary Text

Add a small amount of emphasis to a paragraph.

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, ipsum commodo eros lacus. Adipiscing lectus quis eu vel mauris duis, ac tellus mauris cursus et. Sed deserunt augue orci, pede ac.

<p class="tertiary">Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, ipsum commodo eros lacus. Adipiscing lectus quis eu vel mauris duis, ac tellus mauris cursus et. Sed deserunt augue orci, pede ac.</p>

Quotes

Quotes for testimonials

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Integer posuere erat a ante.

<p class="quote">Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Integer posuere erat a ante.</p>

Basic Text

Standard body text.

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, ipsum commodo eros lacus. Adipiscing lectus quis eu vel mauris duis, ac tellus mauris cursus et. Sed deserunt augue orci, pede ac.

<p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, ipsum commodo eros lacus. Adipiscing lectus quis eu vel mauris duis, ac tellus mauris cursus et. Sed deserunt augue orci, pede ac.</p>

Inline Elements

Bold

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, ipsum commodo eros lacus.

<p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, <strong>ipsum commodo eros</strong> lacus.</p>

Italics

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, ipsum commodo eros lacus.

<p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, <em>ipsum commodo eros</em> lacus.</p>

Abbreviations

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, ipsum commodo eros lacus.

<p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, <abbr title="Expanded version of abbriviated text">ipsum commodo eros</abbr> lacus.</p>

Code

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, <section> commodo eros lacus.

<p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, <code>&lt;section&gt;</code> commodo eros lacus.</p>

Links

Standard link.

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Integer posuere erat a ante.

<p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, <a href="#">consectetur adipiscing elit</a>. Integer posuere erat a ante.</p>
